txt.en: You defeated trolls, as well as the fearsome Fuluk.
Trolls can be found in Parth Daenath, as can the fearsome beast Fuluk.\n\nYou should defeat trolls.
The man who posted the bounty will be pleased to learn you defeated trolls and put an end to Fuluk's crushing days.
A bounty notice asks you to defeat trolls in Parth Daenath.

The bounty notice reads:

'I tell you there is naught more frightening than the lumbering visage of a troll towering over you, weapon raised high and poised to strike. Few of our soldiers are equipped to take down such monstrosities on their own, let alone the great hulking troll Fuluk. He is stronger than the others, and he crushes soldiers beneath his fists just for the amusement of it! He is a formidable foe.

'If you think you can help with our troll problem, slay a few of them and be rewarded, but do not expect a single coin while Fuluk still lives. We need our soldiers uncrushed, and while he stalks the battlefield that is no certain thing.'
